Interface CommissionService

All Superinterfaces:
Service
All Known Subinterfaces:
CommissionServiceLocal
All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface CommissionService
extends Service

Service interface for broker commissions

Author:
Jefferson Magno

Method Detail

acceptBrokerCommissionContract

BrokerCommissionContract acceptBrokerCommissionContract(java.lang.Long brokerCommissionContractId)
A member accepts a pending broker commission contract. The status of the contract is changed to "ACTIVE"

cancelBrokerCommissionContract

BrokerCommissionContract cancelBrokerCommissionContract(java.lang.Long brokerCommissionContractId)
A broker or admin cancels a broker commission contract. The status of the contract is changed to "CANCELLED"

denyBrokerCommissionContract

BrokerCommissionContract denyBrokerCommissionContract(java.lang.Long brokerCommissionContractId)
A member denies a pending broker commission contract. The status of the contract is changed to "DENIED"

Returns a list of charge status for broker commissions related to a member
